episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1101_0100_2:
First up was Lana’s trial.
[Name:PlayerNickname ] led Elio and Selene to
the beach.
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_0200_1:
I’m so glad that you’re here with
us, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_0300_1:
Yeah, especially because we’ve just arrived
on Pasio.
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_0400_1:
If we tried to find everything all by ourselves,
I bet we’d have gotten lost before the trials
even began!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_0700_1:
So...will you be attempting my
Pasio trial?
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_0402_1100_1:
Are you trying to bait Lana into going easy
on you?
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_1400_1:
You just need to fish up something big and
defeat it!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_1500_1:
I knew it! Of course Lana would choose something
related to fishing for her trial!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_1600_1:
But wait! I thought people said there aren’t any
wild Pokémon on Pasio...
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_1700_1:
Wait! Did you hear that? Maybe there’s wild
Pokémon in the ocean!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_1900_1:
There, I heard it again! Why don’t we just give it
a try?
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_2000_1: Sure, why not! Time to catch something big!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1101_2100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and friends cast their
lines and waited.
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_2500_1:
’Sup! Good job reeling us in! We were waitin’ for
you in the ocean!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_2600_1:
We’re your opponents for this trial thing!
You ready for it?
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_2800_1:
*chuckle* I never said what you had to fish for
was a Pokémon!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_2900_1: Hook, line, and sinker! She got us!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_3000_1:
No choice but to battle, then! Let’s go all out,
you two!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_3400_1:
You defeated Marlon and the others, even though
I worked so hard to recruit them...
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_3500_1:
You were amazing, everyone! Truly impressive.
You’ve completed my Pasio trial!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4001_1001_3800_1: Next is Kiawe’s trial. I wish you the best of luck.
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_0200_1:
I am a student of the ancient dances that have
been passed down in Alola for generations...
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_0400_1: ...but I suppose you already knew that.
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_0600_1: Of course, you will attempt my Pasio trial, right?
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_0401_0800_1: Yeah! Let’s work together and clear this thing!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_0402_1000_1: Don’t worry! Leave it to us!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_1100_1:
Very well. My trial will test your powers
of observation!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_1200_1: There will be a dance...and then another.
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_1300_1:
Your task will be to find the difference and
answer a question!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_1400_1:
Nothing new to me! We’ve cleared this kind of
trial before, after all!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_1700_1: Watch carefully and memorize this dance.
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_1800_1: What was different from the previous dance?
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_2000_1: And now, time for a quiz!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_2100_1:
Who is the Gym Leader from Sinnoh who loves
to dance?!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_2400_1: A Gym Leader from Sinnoh?! I have no idea!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_2500_1:
Oh, I know this...but I can’t remember their name!
Uh...their partner was Mismagius...
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_3100_1:
That was truly spectacular! And to add to
the spectacle...
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_3500_1: Hah! Are you ready to get burned?
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_3700_1:
When Fantina, the hotheaded Blaine, and a Pasio
hiker get excited, it’s time for a battle!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_3800_1:
OK! [Name:PlayerNickname ] answered that
quiz, so I’ll do my best in battle!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_4000_1: S-spectacular! You’ve completed my Pasio trial!
episode_event_yo_mizuki/4002_1001_4300_1:
Mallow’s trial is the last one. We’ll be dancing
here to cheer you on!
